899380.name: Kitrinos - Artbook and OST arranged for Piano
899380.description:
This free DLC contains:
- The artbook of Kitrinos: Inside the Cube, given as a PDF file. Discover how we made the graphics of the game.
- The Original Soundtrack of Kitrinos composed by Yazorius (mp3)
- You'll also find another exciting bonus: the Original Soundtrack of the game rearranged for Piano by Yazorius! (new mp3 tracks + partition booklet)

Kitrinos is a free point and click adventure game in first person view (Myst or Zork-like), initially developed during Adventure Jam 2018.
